column8: Night scene from a ferry to Eivissa at the Moll de les Dràssanes. The passengers are mainly children and teenagers who leave to make their traditional journey of end of school year in the Balearic Islands. Exchanges between parents. on the dock. And their children on board. Children are traditionally invited to bring back two specialties from the islands. The ensaimada (a kind of large spiral brioche) and the very spicy sausage called sobrassada. Auxiliary engines of the ship. Call whistled by a member of the crew. Sonal and vocal announcement by sound system. For respondents. The Barcelona farewell ritual is known and entails sympathy. But also sometimes lassitude for its popular aspect. Folk and repetitive. Despite their obsolete appearance. We wish that these eminently sound scenes of arrests between the starters (or the arrivals) and the accompanying persons persist. While the railway and airport worlds do not allow. Or wrong. Or more at all. Such an effusion sound. Which is physically impossible because of the glazing and which would seem incongruous compared to the present standard of relative discretion of farewells. (Abstract of author)

column8: This excerpt taken between 6 pm and 7 pm at the end of September illustrates communication in a dense urban sound environment. The background of circulation is very present (especially at the beginning of the fragment) a few voices stand out. We hear a large number of social groups: high school students, elderly people, and especially a group of Italians who came regularly to discuss here in their native language. The sound environment is not particularly conducive to trade; A priori it even hinders interpersonal communication, but, paradoxically, the place is appreciated and remains considered a pocket of calm compared to the noise that surrounds it. The background noise produces just enough anonymity to make the various users coexist. The Square Victor Hugo (Grenoble) is square (115 m side) circumscribed by tracks on its periphery (road and without tram at the time of this recording), it is occupied in its center by a garden and a fountain .
